column5: Located in the heart of the Bishop Arts District's, this is one of the area's premier addresses. For someone who appreciates custom details and wants a boutique guest experience. Located in the heart of the Bishop Arts District and walking distance to all of the areas best amenities.*IF PART OF YOUR TRIP OVERLAPS WITH AN EXISTING BOOKING CHECKOUT THE OTHER UNITS IN THE BUILDING. IT'S POSSIBLE TO FIND MORE AVAILABLE NIGHTS WHERE YOU CAN MOVE OVER TO ANOTHER UNIT.
